languages.text: The wearer's first attack during the first {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g} of combat costs 0 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g}. Whenever the wearer attacks an enemy and triggers an {g|Encyclopedia:Exploit}exploit{/g} with this attack, the triggered effect is calculated as if this enemy had a +1 additional exploit. ! Can only be equipped by Aeldari.
languages.original_text: Первая атака персонажа в первом {g|Encyclopedia:Round}раунде{/g} боя стоит 0 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}ОД{/g}. Когда персонаж активирует этой атакой {g|Encyclopedia:Exploit}уязвимость{/g}, наложенную на противника, срабатывающий эффект рассчитывается так, как если бы у этого врага была +1 дополнительная уязвимость. ! Может использоваться только эльдарами.

traits.locale_text: The wearer's first attack during the first {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g} of combat costs 0 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g}. Whenever the wearer attacks an enemy and triggers an {g|Encyclopedia:Exploit}exploit{/g} with this attack, the triggered effect is calculated as if this enemy had a +1 additional exploit. ! Can only be equipped by Aeldari.

The wearer's first attack during the first {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g} of combat costs 0 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g}. Whenever the wearer attacks an enemy and triggers an {g|Encyclopedia:Exploit}exploit{/g} with this attack, the triggered effect is calculated as if this enemy had a +1 additional exploit. ! Can only be equipped by Aeldari.

The wearer's first attack during the first {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g} of combat costs 0 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g}. Whenever the wearer attacks an enemy and triggers an {g|Encyclopedia:Exploit}exploit{/g} with this attack, the triggered effect is calculated as if this enemy had a +1 additional exploit. ! Can only be equipped by Aeldari.

languages.text: 装备者在战斗首{g|Encyclopedia:Round}轮{/g}的首次攻击不消耗任何{g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}行动点数{/g}。 当装备者通过此效果攻击，应当移除敌人身上的{g|Encyclopedia:Exploit}研究{/g}层数时，不仅不会移除层数，还会额外施加1层“研究”效果。 ！此装备只能由艾达灵族装备。
languages.original_text: The wearer's first attack during the first {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g} of combat costs 0 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g}. Whenever the wearer attacks an enemy and triggers an {g|Encyclopedia:Exploit}exploit{/g} with this attack, the triggered effect is calculated as if this enemy had a +1 additional exploit. ! Can only be equipped by Aeldari.

traits.locale_text: 当装备者使用双手武器进行{g|Encyclopedia:SingleRangedAttacks}散发{/g}射击时，消耗的{g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}行动点数{/g}降低1点（最低降为0点）。 当装备者应当移除敌人身上的{g|Encyclopedia:Exploit}研究{/g}层数时，不仅不会移除层数，还会额外施加1层“研究”效果。 ！此装备只能由艾达灵族装备。

languages.text: Первая атака персонажа в первом {g|Encyclopedia:Round}раунде{/g} боя стоит 0 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}ОД{/g}. Когда персонаж активирует этой атакой {g|Encyclopedia:Exploit}уязвимость{/g}, наложенную на противника, срабатывающий эффект рассчитывается так, как если бы у этого врага была +1 дополнительная уязвимость. ! Может использоваться только эльдарами.
languages.original_text: The wearer's first attack during the first {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g} of combat costs 0 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g}. Whenever the wearer attacks an enemy and triggers an {g|Encyclopedia:Exploit}exploit{/g} with this attack, the triggered effect is calculated as if this enemy had a +1 additional exploit. ! Can only be equipped by Aeldari.

traits.locale_text: {g|Encyclopedia:SingleRangedAttacks}Одиночные{/g} атаки двуручным оружием требуют на 1 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}ОД{/g} меньше (стоимость может снижаться до 0). Когда персонажу необходимо снять уровень {g|Encyclopedia:Exploit}уязвимости{/g} с противника, число наложенных уровней не уменьшается, а увеличивается на 1. ! Может использоваться только эльдарами.

{g|Encyclopedia:SingleRangedAttacks}Одиночные{/g} атаки двуручным оружием требуют на 1 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}ОД{/g} меньше (стоимость может снижаться до 0). Когда персонажу необходимо снять уровень {g|Encyclopedia:Exploit}уязвимости{/g} с противника, число наложенных уровней не уменьшается, а увеличивается на 1. ! Может использоваться только эльдарами.

languages.text: 戦闘の最初の{g|Encyclopedia:Round}ラウンド{/g}で、使用者の最初の攻撃の消費{g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g}が0になる。 使用者が敵を攻撃して、その攻撃で{g|Encyclopedia:Exploit}エクスプロイト{/g}が発動するたび、発動効果で敵にエクスプロイトが+1追加される。 ！アエルダリのみ装備可能。
languages.original_text: The wearer's first attack during the first {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g} of combat costs 0 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g}. Whenever the wearer attacks an enemy and triggers an {g|Encyclopedia:Exploit}exploit{/g} with this attack, the triggered effect is calculated as if this enemy had a +1 additional exploit. ! Can only be equipped by Aeldari.

traits.locale_text: 両手持ち武器の使用者による{g|Encyclopedia:SingleRangedAttacks}単発射撃{/g}攻撃は{g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g}を1消費する（最小APは0）。 使用者が敵から{g|Encyclopedia:Exploit}エクスプロイト{/g}を取り除くたびに、エクスプロイトは取り除かれず、代わりに1増える。 ！アエルダリのみが装備可能。

languages.text: El primer ataque del portador en el primer {g|Encyclopedia:Round}asalto{/g} del combate cuesta 0 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}PA{/g}. Cada vez que el portador ataque a un enemigo y active una {g|Encyclopedia:Exploit}vulnerabilidad{/g}, el efecto se calcula como si el objetivo tuviera +1 vulnerabilidad adicional. ! Solo lo puede equipar un Aeldari.
languages.original_text: The wearer's first attack during the first {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g} of combat costs 0 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g}. Whenever the wearer attacks an enemy and triggers an {g|Encyclopedia:Exploit}exploit{/g} with this attack, the triggered effect is calculated as if this enemy had a +1 additional exploit. ! Can only be equipped by Aeldari.

traits.locale_text: Los ataques de un {g|Encyclopedia:SingleRangedAttacks}solo disparo{/g} que realice el portador con armas a dos manos cuestan −1 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}PA{/g} menos (hasta un mínimo de 0 AP). Cada vez que el portador deba eliminar una {g|Encyclopedia:Exploit}vulnerabilidad{/g} de un enemigo, las vulnerabilidades no se eliminan, sino que aumentan +1. ! Solo la puede equipar un Aeldari.

languages.text: Der erste Angriff des Trägers während der ersten {g|Encyclopedia:Round}Runde{/g} des Kampfes kostet 0 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g}. Wenn der Träger einen Feind angreift und dabei eine {g|Encyclopedia:Exploit}Ausnutzung{/g} auslöst, wird der ausgelöste Effekt so berechnet, als hätte dieser Feind +1 zusätzliche Ausnutzung. ! Kann nur von Aeldari ausgerüstet werden.
languages.original_text: The wearer's first attack during the first {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g} of combat costs 0 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g}. Whenever the wearer attacks an enemy and triggers an {g|Encyclopedia:Exploit}exploit{/g} with this attack, the triggered effect is calculated as if this enemy had a +1 additional exploit. ! Can only be equipped by Aeldari.

traits.locale_text: Die {g|Encyclopedia:SingleRangedAttacks}Einzelschuss{/g}-Angriffe des Trägers mit zweihändigen Waffen kosten -1 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g} weniger (Minimum 0 AP). Immer wenn der Träger eine {g|Encyclopedia:Exploit}Ausnutzung{/g} von einem Feind entfernen sollte, wird die Ausnutzung nicht entfernt und stattdessen um +1 erhöht. Kann nur von Aeldari ausgerüstet werden!

languages.text: La première attaque de l'utilisateur lors du premier {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g} du combat coûte 0 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}PA{/g}. Chaque fois que l'utilisateur attaque un ennemi et déclenche une {g|Encyclopedia:Exploit}vulnérabilité{/g} avec cette attaque, l'effet déclenché est calculé comme si l'ennemi faisait l'objet de +1 vulnérabilité supplémentaire. ! Uniquement utilisable par les Aeldaris.
languages.original_text: The wearer's first attack during the first {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g} of combat costs 0 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g}. Whenever the wearer attacks an enemy and triggers an {g|Encyclopedia:Exploit}exploit{/g} with this attack, the triggered effect is calculated as if this enemy had a +1 additional exploit. ! Can only be equipped by Aeldari.

traits.locale_text: Les attaques {g|Encyclopedia:SingleRangedAttacks}au coup par coup{/g} de l'utilisateur à l'aide d'armes à deux mains coûtent -1 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}PA{/g} de moins (minimum 0 PA). Lorsque l'utilisateur est censé retirer un {g|Encyclopedia:Exploit}exploit{/g} à un ennemi, non seulement les exploits ne sont pas retirés mais ils augmentent de +1. ! Uniquement utilisable par les Aeldari.

Les attaques {g|Encyclopedia:SingleRangedAttacks}au coup par coup{/g} de l'utilisateur à l'aide d'armes à deux mains coûtent -1 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}PA{/g} de moins (minimum 0 PA). Lorsque l'utilisateur est censé retirer un {g|Encyclopedia:Exploit}exploit{/g} à un ennemi, non seulement les exploits ne sont pas retirés mais ils augmentent de +1. ! Uniquement utilisable par les Aeldari.

languages.text: Takan kişinin çatışmanın ilk {g|Encyclopedia:Round}raundundaki{/g} ilk saldırısı, 0 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}EP{/g} harcar. Takan kişi bir düşmana saldırdığında ve bu saldırıyla bir {g|Encyclopedia:Exploit}sömürüyü{/g} tetiklediğinde tetiklenen etki, bu düşman +1 ilave sömürüye sahipmiş gibi hesaplanır. ! Yalnızca Aeldarilerce kuşanılabilir.
languages.original_text: The wearer's first attack during the first {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g} of combat costs 0 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g}. Whenever the wearer attacks an enemy and triggers an {g|Encyclopedia:Exploit}exploit{/g} with this attack, the triggered effect is calculated as if this enemy had a +1 additional exploit. ! Can only be equipped by Aeldari.
